item.title: Orrin Kael
item.description:
Overview

Orrin Kael is an operative in the city of City of Sarn known for navigating the Tenebrous Runnels and monitoring anomalies linked to the Halcyon Codex. His work bridges the gap between the city’s physical architecture and the cryptic information in the Codex.

Background

Kael was trained in urban reconnaissance and structural analysis. Early assignments in the Loom-Arrondissement gave him extensive knowledge of Sarn’s vertical infrastructure, making him a key resource for interpreting unexpected shifts reported by the Codex.

item.title: The Scribe
item.description:
Overview

The Scribe is an enigmatic figure whose annotations in the Halcyon Codex guide the actions of Lysander Veyr and Eira Voss. Their identity and motives remain largely unexplored, creating intrigue throughout the narrative.

Background

Little is known about The Scribe beyond the marginalia left in the Codex. Analysis of writing style and patterns suggests extensive familiarity with the City of Sarn and its subterranean networks, including the Tenebrous Runnels.

Role in the Story

The Scribe’s contributions appear indirectly, as guidance embedded within the Codex. These annotations often anticipate structural or social anomalies and challenge protagonists to interpret them accurately.

item.title: Dr. Allene Mire
item.description:
Overview

Dr. Allene Mire is a leading biologist in the city of City of Sarn who becomes involved in the investigations surrounding the Halcyon Codex. Her expertise in genetic mapping and social stratification informs many of the debates about the Codex’s implications.

Background

Mire’s research in cellular genetics and the documentation of the Vellum Names system earned her recognition within Sarn’s scientific circles. She has a reputation for rigorous methodology and a cautious approach to anomalies reported in the Codex.

item.title: Eira Voss
item.description:
Overview

Eira Voss is a prominent engineer specializing in reflective systems within the City of Sarn. She works closely with Lysander Veyr to understand the interactions between the Halcyon Codex and the city’s structures.

Background

Voss was trained in the mechanics and engineering of the Loom Arrondissement. Her early work in architectural simulations led her to the study of the Codex, recognizing its patterns within the city’s vertical layouts.

Role in the Story

Eira assists Lysander Veyr in interpreting the Codex, often focusing on the physical and structural effects it seems to impose on Sarn. She conducts experiments in the Tenebrous Runnels to verify anomalies reported in the manuscripts and cross-references her findings with the Klyth Index.

item.title: Lysander Veyr
item.description:
Overview

Lysander Veyr is the central protagonist in Klyth-77 The Halcyon Codex of Sarn. He is an archivist and mapkeeper of the city of City of Sarn and becomes deeply involved with the mysteries of the Halcyon Codex.

Background

Veyr grew up within the Loom Arrondissement, studying the complex vertical structures of Sarn. He is known for his meticulous attention to the indexing of the Klyth Index and his ability to interpret marginal annotations in ancient manuscripts.
